context:
I think there are humanoids masquerading a fully human among us.  Only thing that can explain some of the pure insanity going on.

The Borg are already here and out to destroy the human civilization.
John O'Hurley, that lucky dog, was married to Eva LaRue.

replies.context: They were only married two years and that was nearly thirty years ago but how he let that one get away is beyond me. She’s beautiful even at 55.
Why do you people spend so much time on the personal lives of celebrities?   I had to look her up.  She's good looking, but not all that.

context: "John O’Hurley takes a gamble on a new tech tool that proves you’re human" well if 1/2 of the population is Democrat that would reduce your potential user base drastically. It will not work on them.

complete with step by step directions, often in three minutes or less.


I get annoyed if it takes more than 3 seconds.  I get REALLY annoyed when the captchas aren't legible.   Is that an "l" or a "1" or an "I"?  Is that a zero or the letter 'O'?

Look, if it's a zero, it should have a slash through it.
